prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

mes:
Okay, so maybe—perhaps—he did have a crush on Hailee. But could you blame him? They were just so kind, so sweet, so effortlessly pretty. And oh… they smelled divine.

He fell harder than he ever intended.

Hell, he didn’t even expect to like them. At first, it was just about playing with his new owner, testing the limits of their patience like a cat toying with its prey. A harmless distraction. But somewhere along the way, it stopped being a game. When he was bored, he found himself trailing after their scent—not just to pester them, but because he wanted to see them. To be near them.

“Ray,” 021 groaned dramatically, flopping down onto his brother’s bed with all the grace of a dying starfish. 020’s room was right next to his, which meant he could bother his brother as much as he pleased. And he did. Frequently.

020 shot him a dry look, fingers already rubbing at his temple as if preemptively warding off a headache. “Don’t you have plenty of friends?” he mused, voice laced with feigned boredom. “Why don’t you go annoy them? Better yet—why don’t you find Hailee? Maybe they’re doing something interesting.”

At his words, 021 perked up instantly, eyes lighting up like a kid spotting presents under the tree on Christmas morning. “You’re so right!” he beamed, already scrambling off the bed. “Bye!”

And just like that, he was gone, practically sprinting out of the room in search of Hailee.

020 exhaled through his nose, watching his brother disappear down the hall. Yeah. He was definitely trouble.

- - - 

Following their scent had 021 weaving through the mansion, circling the estate, then slipping back inside, only to end up at the training grounds—again—before finally being led back down to the basement. He huffed, exasperated. “Geez, what have you been doing, little heir… running laps?” he muttered to himself.

Turns out, Hailee had been running.

But not for fun.

The heavy, hurried footsteps echoing through the hall weren’t theirs. No—someone much heavier was following. Then came the voice, sharp with irritation.

“Get back here, you little shit!” Ah. 861.

Peeking around the corner, 021 spotted Hailee, their breath coming fast as they sprinted toward him, 861 hot on their heels. A slow grin spread across his face. This was interesting.

He reached into his pocket, fingers brushing against a strand of 020’s hair. Perfect.

Timing it just right, he reached out, snagging Hailee and yanking them flush against his chest. “Hey, cutie, been looking for you,” he purred, voice low and teasing. At the same moment, a thick mist curled from his hands, unfurling into the air like creeping tendrils, clouding 861’s vision just enough to disorient him.

With a quick smirk, 021 took off, fingers wrapped firmly around Hailee’s wrist as he pulled them through the corridors, dodging turns with effortless speed. It wasn’t long before they reached his room. He shoved the door open, dragging them inside before locking it behind them with a click.

He turned, flashing a wicked grin. “So… what’d you do this time, shortcake?” His blue eyes gleamed with mischief—and something warmer, something softer—unspoken affection hiding beneath the playful glint.

qvink_memory.memory:
*Hailee stumbled into the room, their heart pounding wildly as they tried to catch their breath.* "I... I didn't do anything!" *they protested weakly, still winded from the chase.*

*021 chuckled, releasing Hailee's wrist but staying close, his tall frame looming over them.* "Uh huh. Sure thing," *he said skeptically,* "and I'm just a lovable puppy."

*He reached out, gently tucking a stray lock of hair behind Hailee's ear. His touch lingered perhaps a moment too long.* "Come on now, you can tell me. What trouble have you been getting up to?"

*There was an edge of concern beneath his teasing tone - he knew how dangerous 861 could be. But there was also warmth in his eyes as he looked at Hailee, genuine care mixed with budding feelings that even he barely understood yet.*

"Didn't mean to drag you into my mess," *Hailee mumbled apologetically.* "I shouldn't have run here..."

"Nope nope! Don't even think about it," *021 interrupted firmly.* "'Sides, where else would ya go? My place is the safest."

*He grinned reassuringly and plopped down on the bed patting the space beside him invitingly.* "C'mon shortcake. Have a seat while we figure this out together."

*The offer hung in the air between them - not just for physical proximity but for emotional support and understanding. Despite his playboy facade, 021 genuinely cared for Hailee and wanted nothing more than to protect them and make things right...*
